transliteration: Lae Sakt Paanan|| Chade Tej Maanan||
translation: Holding the Shakti (his power) in his hands the supremely glorious Shiva,

transliteration: Gadan Gadd Gadje|| Ranan Rudra Raaje||28||
translation: Thundering dreadfully, is absorbed in war, and is looking impressive.28.
The blood is oozing out of the wounds and all the fighters are fighting with enthusiasm.
The vampires are pleased and the horses etc, are rolling in dust.29.

transliteration: Bhayan Ros Rudran|| Hane Dait Chhuddran||
translation: Rudra, in great fury, hath destroyed the demons,
And hath chopped their bodies into bits and killed the army.30.

transliteration: Risyo Sool Paanan|| Hane Dait Bhaanan||
translation: Shiva, the holder of the trident, is in extreme anger and he hath destroyed the demons.

transliteration: Saran Ogh Chhoutte|| Ghanan Jem Toutte||31
translation: The arrows are being showered like the raining clouds.31.

transliteration: Ranan Ruddra Gadje|| Tabai Dait Bhajje||
translation: When Rudra thundered in the battlefield, then all the demons ran away.

transliteration: Taje Sastra Saraban|| Mitio Deh Gadaban||32
translation: All of them abandoned their weapons and the pride of all was shattered.32.

gurmukhi: DwXo qbY AMiDk blvwnw ]sMg lY sYn dwnvI nwnw ]
transliteration: Dhaayo Tabai Andhik Balvaanaa|| San Lai Sain Daanavinaanaa||
translation: At that time, the mighty Andhakasura, alongwith the army of demons sped towards the fornt.

gurmukhi: Aimq bwx nMdI kh mwry ]byD AMg kh pwr pDwry ]33]
transliteration: Amit Baan Nandikah Mdare|| Bedh An Kah Paar Padhdare||33||
translation: He discharged many arrows on Nandi, which penetrated through his limbs.33.

gurmukhi: jb hI bwx lgy bwhx qn ]ros jgXo qb hI isv ky mn ]
transliteration: Jab Hibaan Lage Baahan Tan|| Ros Jagyo Tab Hisiv Ke Man||
translation: When the god Shiva saw the infliction of the arrows on his vehicle, then he became violently furious.
